incidents.name: Delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations and are still working on the fix with the carrier. We will provide updates in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations and are still working on the fix with the carrier. We will provide updates in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations and are still working on the fix with the carrier. We will provide updates in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have identified potential delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations. Our engineering team has been notified and is currently investigating the issue. We will provide updates in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Australia and New Zealand Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Australia and New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 July 2024 at 07:00 PDT until 30 July 2024 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Australia and New Zealand phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon/Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon/Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 July 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 30 July 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon/Yota Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Verizon Wireless

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Verizon Wireless United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 30 July 2024 at 19:00 PDT until 30 July 2024 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Verizon Wireless United States customers.

Impacted Product: Verify Silent Network Auth-Lookup SIM Swap-Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter Scheduled Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance Details: We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically removing a non-essential component from our system. This update is expected to be completed in less than a second and should not affect your service.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the systems performance during and after the update to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency Plan: In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately. Should a rollback be necessary, there may be a  downtime of approximately 2 minutes

Maintenance Details:We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically removing a non-essential component from our system. This update is expected to be completed in less than a second and should not affect your service.

Contingency Plan:In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately. Should a rollback be necessary, there may be a downtime of approximately 2 minutes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Flex Insights Planned Maintenance

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, August 3rd, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable, and any scheduled ETLs will be affected.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Authy and Verify V1 API - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned Global maintenance between 15:00 to 15:30 Pacific Time on 08/03/2024. During the maintenance window, all Authy API requests will fail. Communicate to your customers (end users) about this planned downtime for maintenance before August 3, 2024. Due to Authy APIs deprecation (https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/authy-vs-verify), we strongly encourage migrating to the Verify V2 API. Verify V2 API, specifically SMS/Voice OTP delivery, is unaffected by this maintenance downtime.
